AppDesc.message: Adds quick emoji shortcuts to the chat window

ftr_10_1.message: Set custom background color in the Meet

ftr_11_1.message: Stop other from muting your mic

ftr_12_1.message: Adds a border around speaking participants

ftr_13_1.message: View a participants video in picture-in-picture

ftr_16_1.message: Auto full screen when someone is presenting

ftr_17_1.message: Toggle the bottom control bar to appear

ftr_18_1.message: Displays a meeting timer in top menu bar

ftr_19_1.message: Hides "Are you speaking?" popup when muted

ftr_1_3.message: Click to begin listening, click again to save.

ftr_20_1.message: Automatically pins chat view when joining Meet

ftr_21_1.message: Automatically admits new entrants to the Meet

ftr_22_1.message: Automatically denies new entrants to the Meet

ftr_23_1.message: Mirrors all videos in the Meet

ftr_24_1.message: Display the clock even when not in fullscreen

ftr_25_1.message: Hides "Add Others" pop-up when joining a Meet

ftr_26_1.message: Hide comments and user join pop-ups

ftr_27_1.message: Click the extension icon to find the active Meet tab

ftr_28_1.message: Mute all participants via the participants menu

ftr_29_1.message: Remove all participants via the participants menu

ftr_30_1.message: Adds quick emoji shortcuts to the chat window

ftr_3_1.message: Use hotkey to leave a call

ftr_4_1.message: Ask to confirm when you leave a meeting

ftr_7_1.message: Set video to off on join

ftr_8_1.message: Pins the control bar to the bottom of the screen

ftr_9_1.message: Hides participants names on their videos
